For those parents who choose 
to have a post-mortem on 
their baby, this will be carried 
out in Alderhay Women’s and 
Children’s Trust.
For those parents who 
choose not to have a post-
mortem, other tests including 
genetic testing and testing 
your placenta may provide 
important answers as to why 
your baby died.
Multiple births
The loss of one baby from 
a multiple pregnancy is 
very	difficult	for	any	parent.
